servinfo.title: Sliding (Sun) Roof Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove head lining referring to Head Lining Removal and Installation .
Remove sliding roof glass referring to Sliding (Sun) Roof Glass Removal and Installation .
Disconnect drain hoses (1) connected to sliding roof assembly at 4 locations.
Disconnect sliding roof motor (1) at coupler (2).
Remove 8 nuts (1) and 4 bolts (2), then remove sliding roof assembly (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: For installation, reverse removal procedure, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Connect drain hoses (1) to sliding roof assembly at 4 locations. Clamp drain hose by each clamp securely.
Pass rear drain hose between rib of outlet ventilator (2).
Initialize sliding roof position data referring to “How to reactivate the system to prevent being pinched by the sunroof” in Sunroof section of Owner’s manual.
After reinstalling sliding roof assembly, be sure to make glass adjustment. (Refer to Sliding (Sun) Roof Glass Adjustment .)
